infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app requires access to save your meditation sessions as mindfulness data
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app requires access to save your meditation sessions as mindfulness data
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to provide weather information and location-based services
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to your location to provide weather information and location-based features
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to provide weather information and location-based features
